Reviews.Title: Nice solid smartphone
Reviews.Author: Samurai
Reviews.Content: This Blackberry is my favorite. It feels very solid especially compared to all the newer models; they feel very "plasticky". The color white is an attention catcher. I am always asked what king of phone is that. The operating system is really fast and is very smart. I like the center ball. It makes life easy. I highly recommend this phone but make sure you get it with the Blackberry leather case. My phone screen automatically turns off when I slide it in the case; that makes the phone last 3 days before I have to charge.

Reviews.Title: Feedback
Reviews.Author: Ivanna Perez
Reviews.Content: Hi!I bought 2 BB 9000 and i have no major complaints, except non-original Blackberry batteries. One of them threw and error (523) a few hours after, but it turn back to normal after a few minutes. The other one has a small bump in a corner, but nothing too important. I once bought 2 BB from Ebay and was scammed by the seller, the cellphones were reported stolen! so i lost my money. Because of that experience, i was a little apprehensive about buying again on-line.So far nothing has happened with my purchase, so i recommend this product.Thank You!Ivanna Pérez
